Articles.Content:
Hello, I was making a boat, and got it out to sea, and then realized the fact that the Seasickness mod (link here http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/sea-sickness-cure/) I had on it, didn't work, so my kerbals flailed around on the boat without being able to get up.

My question is, can someone update this mod?

I need it for a video, and for reasons.

Hello, I was making a boat, and got it out to sea, and then realized the fact that the Seasickness mod (link here http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/sea-sickness-cure/) I had on it, didn't work, so my kerbals flailed around on the boat without being able to get up.

My question is, can someone update this mod?

I need it for a video, and for reasons.

I'll do it for ya.

Edit:

Download it here.

I made no functional changes to the code (no need) - it'll work the same as the previous version.

The model is now a lifesaver I made, you can use any model though.

Extract the archive inside your KSP directory and you're good to go.

Edited June 15, 2013 by Razchek
Thanks for updating the plugin I cant belive people havnt tried it before, author really deserve cred for making an important fix ^^ cheers
